formatDescription: Cindex is software developed by Indexing Research for creating indexes to books, newspapers and other periodical publications. The .TPL variant is a template file, however it is structurally identical to .CDX.
provenanceCompoundName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

internalSignatures.name: Cindex Document 2
internalSignatures.note: Hexadecimal only signature based on observation - 0x18240000CB000000. Please contact the PRONOM team if you can help to strengthen this signature.
